title: Club user edits drafted Player during draft
custom_preconds:
Note: 
- Realistic draft system dates must be set prior to running this test. 
- Club users will only be able to edit profiles for players their club actually has drafted
-This test should be setup such that we can simulate multiple users (10 minimum) performing these actions concurrently for different players


GIVEN the 2020 Draft is in progress in EBIS and concurrent load tests are running
custom_steps:
WHEN user performs the following:

1)Login as a club
2)navigate to https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/rule4/postdraft
3)navigate to the profile of one of the drafted players via hyperlink in the Player column
4)Once the profile loads - click Edit button on the Info tab
5)populate or make changes to the following fields:
Mother's Name
Father's Name
Height
Weight
Bats
Throws

Phone Number:
Type
Country Code
Phone Number

Email Address(es):
Type
Email

Address(es):
Type
Country
Street Address
City
State
Zip Code

National ID:
Country
Type
Number

Position(s)
Advisor at Draft(agent)
Agency At Draft

6)Click Save
custom_expected:
THEN all updates will be saved in the DB and will display the updates on the UI
AND profile should re-load in View mode
AND successful save blue notif should fire

title: Club user runs Drafted Players Report while draft is in-progress
custom_preconds: GIVEN the 2020 Draft is in progress in EBIS and concurrent load tests are running
custom_steps:
WHEN user performs the following:

1)login as a club user
2)Navigate to reports widget
3)Scroll down to Drafted Players report
4)click hyperlink to run report
5)Once prompt modal loads enter the following:
Draft Year: 2020
Org: Blank (default)
6)Click OK
custom_expected:
THEN report will run with no errors
AND all players drafted thus far in the draft will be displayed
